caption.title: Evaluating the relative contribution of uncertainty components in projections
caption.p: Future (2071â€“2100) probabilities of habitat suitability were related to the three uncertainty factors (Data, SDM et CS) using an ANOVA. We partitioned out the variability in projections due to each uncertainty component using the ratio between the deviance explained by one factor and the null deviance. (SDM,Species Distribution Models; CS, Climate Simulations).
